Initial commit: Jeopardy game with Supabase authentication

Features:
- Username/password authentication with Supabase
- User registration and login
- Jeopardy-style trivia game with 3 categories
- Daily Doubles with custom wagering
- Final Jeopardy round
- Real-time scoring with timer \(15-second depletion\)
- Daily leaderboard with rankings
- One play per day enforcement
- Top 3 players display on completion
- 30-day session persistence
- Purple-themed UI

Tech stack:
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- NextAuth.js for authentication
- Supabase for database
- bcryptjs for password hashing
